title: Complete project documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the task management application including API docs, user guide, and deployment instructions.

title: Implement user authentication
description: Add login and registration functionality with JWT tokens and role-based access control.

title: Fix responsive layout issues
description: Address mobile/tablet layout problems identified during testing. Focus on navigation and task list views.

title: Optimize database queries
description: Review and optimize slow-running queries, add appropriate indexes, and implement query caching.

title: Add export functionality
description: Allow users to export tasks to CSV, PDF, and Excel formats with filtering options.

title: Setup CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure automated testing, building, and deployment using GitHub Actions.

title: Implement dark mode
description: Add dark theme support with system preference detection and manual toggle.

title: Add task templates
description: Create pre-defined task templates for common project types and workflows.
